original_text: You may ask, “Why are these things happening to me?” It is because of your many terrible sins. Like an adulteress, they have torn off your dress to make you ashamed. You may ask, “Why are these things happening to me?” It is because of your many terrible sins. Like an adulteress, they have torn off your dress to make you ashamed. You may ask,
korean_text: 네가 마음으로 이르기를 어찌하여 이런 일이 내게 닥쳤는고 하겠으나 네 죄악이 크므로 네 치마가 들리고 네 발뒤꿈치가 상함이니라

sentences.original_text: Why are these things happening to me?
It is because of your many terrible sins
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 너의 많은 끔찍한 죄 때문이다

sentences.original_text: they have torn off your dress
